moduleMetadataJson.name: Telephone Line Voice Scanner
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module dials a range of phone numbers and records audio from each answered call
author: hdm <x@hdm.io>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: IAX_HOST
options.description: The IAX2 server to communicate with

options.name: TARGETS
options.description: A list of telephone masks in the format of 1-555-555-5XXX, separated by commas

options.name: OUTPUT_PATH
options.description: A local directory to store the resulting audio files

options.name: CALL_TIME
options.description: The maximum time in seconds to spent on each call (ring + recording)
